name: God Eater Off Shot: Alisa-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 3
name_original: God Eater Off Shot: Alisa-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 3
description:
God Eater Off Shot: Alisa-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 3 is an arcade game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was originally released in 2015. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
God Eater Off Shot: Alisa-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 3 is available on PlayStation 4.
